replies.body: He's the best NA adc. Watch his twitch stream when he's versus Sneaky he craps on him every single game. Literally.
piglet

yeah he is,he plays for team liquid
WTF CLG kicked him out ? O_O Who they gonna pick up ...
I imagine they will be importing a player. Freeze maybe?
What about Hi im Gosu ? xD that would be a whole new Clg {{champion:67}}
Hi Im Gosu would probably suck in team play. He's a solo que monster and thats all I really expect out of him.

Yes Gosu goes too hame sometimes. However, he's grown a lot as a team player and I think it is not out of the question for him to start playing pro. But he's kind of shy, he's never shown his face to the public.
Ranked teams with your 5 challenger friends shitting on Gold V plebs is not the same as Professional level play.

I never said that was professional level play. I'm just saying it's not a long shot for him to go pro.
RIP Rush Hour bot lane
You know, I'm glad TSM found a decent ADC. They had trouble with that for a while.
Turtle wasn't all that bad. It took them a couple seasons just to get rid of Regi from Mid lane. That's what made them even a contender in pro play. lol.
Turtle was actually played really well as he stole dragons and even barons blindly ,  where the blind baron steal resulted in them winning op TL.
Except Sneaky is better than you.

Right? I don't even know what to feel.
next year is gonna be fun (hopefully). both Fnatic and TSM look (repeat look) to be able to compete with Korean teams.

> [{quoted}](name=chriserit,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=bY4qQFks,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-11-01T10:42:19.358+0000)
>
> next year is gonna be fun (hopefully). both Fnatic and TSM look (repeat look) to be able to compete with Korean teams.

Agreed. I really hope they come out strong and begin to show the true colors. IMPO the NA region has key players that together could make a team strong enough to compete on the world stage spread over many teams. Not to mention there seems to be a large gap between coaching quality for NA compared to other regions.

Yeah. Like, there are decent options for a strong team

Top: Quas/Zion ( / Impact)
Jungle: Rush
Mid: Bjergsen ( / Incarnation, Fenix)
ADC: Doublelift (Sneaky, WildTurtle / Piglet)
Support: Aphromoo (Adrian, Smoothie)
Coach: Hai (lol)

Idk who'd be the main sub though, especially with all of the good ADCs. I moved Impact out for Quas or Zion 'cuz Rush and Bjerg already fill up the 2 foreign player spots. Everything after "/" is, for all intents and purposes, not a contender for sub (for the same reason as Impact). So shaving everything off, the most likely options are... 

Top: Quas (ZionSpartan Substitute)
Jungle: Rush
Mid: Bjergsen
ADC: Doublelift
Support: Aphromoo
Coach: Hai (Pls Hai the dream)

Whether or not this team is realistic is another story entirely, but yeah.

> [{quoted}](name=Axis the Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=bY4qQFks,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T22:28:40.628+0000)

Everything after "/" is, for all intents and purposes, not a contender for sub (for the same reason as Impact). So shaving everything off, the most likely options are... 
> 
> Top: Quas (ZionSpartan Substitute)
> Jungle: Rush
> Mid: Bjergsen
> ADC: Doublelift
> Support: Aphromoo
> Coach: Hai (Pls Hai the dream)
> 
> Whether or not this team is realistic is another story entirely, but yeah.

That would be a pretty nice team. Agreed on the realistic part being up in the air. What I can say though is that Aphromoo and or Zion seem realistic as the dynamic of CLG has undoubtedly been changed completely. We know how close Aphro and D-lift were, not to mention how bad Zion wants to win worlds; if he doesn't see potential I wouldn't be surprised if he found a place for himself elsewhere. 

Regardless of how it all ends up playing out I will definitely be looking forward to next season.
Poor doublelift gets kicked but gets to TSM in less than 3 hours
worth
I really like Doublelift but i don't want to become a TSM fan - why o why :/
CLG just kicked their 2 best players (Pobelter, Doublelift). They also lost half of their fanbase with Doublelift. I wonder, what kind of amazing new players they found to make up for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Kalarepa,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=bY4qQFks,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-11-01T09:12:53.296+0000)
>
> CLG just kicked their 2 best players (Pobelter, Doublelift). They also lost half of their fanbase with Doublelift. I wonder, what kind of amazing new players they found to make up for it.

Totally agree. I have been a fan of CLG since I started playing the game (S1) and I have continued to support them largely due to Doublelift; my favorite adc/NA player. With him getting KICKED from CLG after 4 years of support and consistent play (more or less) I can't help but to stop supporting CLG. I'll be following Doublelift and now that he's with Bjergsen hopefully they will slaughter the other NA teams :P. 

It's definitely going to be weird cheering TSM on when they face CLG as that's been the opposite for the past few years.

Does this mean doublelift won't be with aphromoo anymore? I wonder how quickly he'll be able to synergise with his new bot lane partner, as it's hard to match the level of synergy years of playing with the same partner can bring.

This isn't much to go on but I found a video where doublelift says zionspartan was the reason why he got kicked for CLG.  I'd love to know the rest of the story though.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VGWSPveH0A4

Some interesting comments here... I guess Ill throw my .02 in the ring.

1) I have NO idea what CLG's plan is... This kind of turnover cannot be good. And yea.. it does beg the questions... who WILL be their ADC next year?? And are there other shoes to drop??

2) I consider this a gift to Regi. He was obviously VERY conflicted about the ADC role all summer (Turtle on "probation"... trying out Keith- who was NOT the answer.) TSM advertises "open" tryouts for ADCs and BOOM a top tier ADC comes free.

2a) Yes, it IS an opinion (and we all know how THOSE go),... but I DO consider DLift top tier NA.

Here is my ranking:

1. Piglet
2. Sneaky
3. DLift
4. Everyone Else

3) Even if it's an upgrade for TSM... They still have 3 MASSIVE holes in the team to fill.  I never considered ADC the #1 priority to fix post-season for them anyway. Regi still has a lot more work to do.. And the news trickling out of the TSM house/office is far from done.
Does...does this mean I'm a TSM fan now? I'm so conflicted. I think I need sometime.
What I'm wondering is who's going to be the new ADC on CLG, and where's Wildturtle going?
Bad move by TSM. What NA need is more European imports to carry their mechanically inferior asses.
lol orrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr they could get a world class adc in double lift and then spend those two foreigner spots on top and jungle which are the two really weak na roles

Well technically Mid is pretty damn weak in NA too

All the best NA midlaners are imports (Bjerg, Incarnation, Fenix, XwX, etc.) The only ones that aren't that I can think of are Pobelter and Shiphtur
TSM new Support will be MadLife. The Dream will come true
Who cares.  As long as Worlds is about seeing LoL played at the highest level, they can have whatever acronyms they want.
WHERE IS TURTLE GOING??????????????
Breaking News: TSM Destroys US. TSM wins worlds. GG

Shocking news but a good move imo. NA's best adc joining it's best mid laner reminds me of when Lebron James went from Cleveland to Miami to join forces with Dwayne Wade in the NBA - both were premier players in the sport at that time and they did win two championships.
Dblift is nowhere near the best adc. There is sneaky and piglet, even altec is better.
Wat.
Wait wut?
Oh shit. This is scary for the rest of the NA teams. If Reggie can actually whip Doublelift into shape (teamwork and whatnot) then there may be a slaughter in the competitive scene.
So they don't have a coach and got rid of Pobelter and Doublelift? Man CLG better have something big cause right now these decisions just don't make since.
This is not a positive for TSM.  DoubleLift is the most over-rated player of all time.
